post:
Hello,
We've got a new node in North Carolina and here's our new offer, also do note, these will be provisioned only on our North Carolina Node and not on the Kansas node.

All the VPS's come with,
1 Gbit Shared Line
Dedicated RAM 
8 Shared Cores of 2 X L5420 Processors at 2.50 Ghz each core.
1 Static IPv4

OpenVZ Plan Details :
1 GB Guaranteed RAM
512 MB Burst RAM
20 GB HDD
300 GB Bandwidth -- Free Upgrade to 1 TB Bandwidth open a ticket requesting the upgrade after ordering.
Proxmox Control Panel
8 Shared Cores of 2 X L5420 Processors at 2.50 Ghz each core (Each processor has 4 cores, so 2 x 4 = 8)

Order Link :
https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=3

KVM Plan Details :
512 MB Guaranteed RAM
20 GB HDD
300 GB Bandwidth -- Free Upgrade to 1 TB Bandwidth open a ticket requesting the upgrade after ordering.
Proxmox Control Panel
8 Shared Cores of 2 X L5420 Processors at 2.50 Ghz each core (Each processor has 4 cores, so 2 x 4 = 8)

Order Link :
https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=7

Note : If you want to install the OS in KVM on your own, just select any OS in the order cart, and type in the notes during checkout that You'll install the OS on your own, we'll provide you access to your KVM VPS in Proxmox and you can do the install by using the VNC in Proxmox.

Test IP : 199.241.185.243
Test File : http://199.241.185.243/100mb.test
Location : North Carolina, USA
